author: cezar
msg: Implement XMLInputStream on the new store.

author: niq
msg: Commit the b**** API for get_name, dammit!

author: bnicholes
msg: Fix a race condition when creating the connection pool mutex and make sure that memory is being allocated from the correct pools when connections are being established. Enforce the GLOBAL_ONLY parameter for all of the directives.

author: jta
msg: Roger Dudler provided a nicely organized informal page on the Derby Wiki
This change copies the final logos from DERBY-914 into the Derby web site
and modifies logo.html to link to them (and tries to duplicate Roger's
Wiki format as much as possible).
